name: Control Shot
description:
Shoot enemies to take over control of their shell.

But careful: You leave your own shell exposed!

If you switch to another shell, the old one dies. Except for your original shell, which is used to this kind of behaviour.

You will have to protect your old shell and the one which you control, or you die.

Try to survive and shoot as many enemies as possible to max out your score!

You can move with W, A, S, D

Shoot with SPACE

Press R to restart the game at any time!

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!
